text: Today on the West Coast, conditions are poor with 6 ft @12s WNW swell, but fresh 19 mph SSW winds are making it blown out. Tomorrow, the swell drops to 5 ft @6s from the south, with strong 34 mph S winds, keeping it messy. The day after, similar 6 ft @9s WSW swell continues, but with 32 mph SSW winds, it remains challenging. Best: none.
